content: KTH | Marco Chiesa Skip to main content Marco ChiesaAssociate professorKungliga Tekniska Högskolanhttps://www.kth.se/profile/mchiesaDetailsWorks for Division of Software and Computer SystemsTelephone +46 8 790 44 29Unit address Lindstedtsvägen 30E-mail mchiesa@kth.seResearcherResearcher IDORCID IDScopus IDGoogle Scholar IDAbout mePersonal homepage (with all information): https://marchiesa.bitbucket.io I am an Associate Professor and leader of the MINDS Lab group at the KTH Royal Institute of Technology. Starting from January 2026, I will act as the studierektor for SCS. My research spans computer networking and AI-driven software systems, with a particular focus on Internet architectures, AI data centers, protocol design, and the intersection ofsecurity,privacy, andautomation. Recently, I have been exploringAI-based code generation and verification as a foundation for building more reliable, secure, and explainable systems, combining formal methods with machine learning to advance intelligent infrastructure, and applications to networking.
